item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo fined, suspended for two games for incident with fan at Goodison Park
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo fined, suspended for two games for incident with fan at Goodison Park The 37-year-old is a free agent now after Manchester United announced his release from the contract on Tuesday.
